name: AWS Lambda
short: A serverless compute service that runs code in response to events and automatically manages the underlying compute resources.
description: AWS Lambda is an event-driven, serverless computing platform that allows users to execute code in response to events without the need for server management. It supports languages like Python and Node.js, and integrates seamlessly with other AWS services. Lambda functions have a 15-minute runtime limit and users are billed based on compute time and request count, providing cost efficiency. With integrated monitoring and security, Lambda ensures a scalable and secure computing experience.
